body_text:
The options only have two fields - label (displayed name) and value (the abbreviation), e.g. { label: 'Albania', value: 'AL'}, so I don't think it's necessary to manually pluck those values out.

I don't understand why plucking them out is a problem that we're avoiding. What's bad about it?

I don't understand why plucking them out is a problem that we're avoiding. What's bad about it?
body_html:
The options only have two fields - label (displayed name) and value (the abbreviation), e.g. { label: 'Albania', value: 'AL'}, so I don't think it's necessary to manually pluck those values out.

I don't understand why plucking them out is a problem that we're avoiding. What's bad about it?
